mapper.sql: id, parts_id, type, in_price, out_price, work_price, stock_count, sell_count, operator, remark, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into store_goods (parts_id, type, in_price, out_price, work_price, stock_count, sell_count, operator, remark, create_time) values (#{partsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{workPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())

insert into store_goods
id,
parts_id,
type,
in_price,
out_price,
work_price,
stock_count,
sell_count,
operator,
remark,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update store_goods
parts_id = #{partsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_price = #{inPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
out_price = #{outPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
work_price = #{workPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sell_count = #{sellCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update store_goods set parts_id = #{partsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_price = #{inPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_price = #{outPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, work_price = #{workPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sell_count = #{sellCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT g.*, p.parts_name as category FROM store_goods g LEFT JOIN store_parts p on p.id = g.parts_id ORDER BY g.create_time DESC limit #{pageVO.startIndex}, #{pageVO.endIndex}

SELECT g.*, p.parts_name as category FROM store_goods g LEFT JOIN store_parts p on p.id = g.parts_id WHERE g.parts_id = #{type} ORDER BY g.create_time DESC limit #{pageVO.startIndex}, #{pageVO.endIndex}
